alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued February 25 at 3:41AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE FORT WORTH PD IS SEARCHING FOR HARMONY RODRIGUEZ, BLACK, FEMALE, 11 MONTHS OLD, MARCH 30 2021, 26 INCHES, 30 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND LAST SEEN WEARING A YELLOW AND BROWN ONESIE. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR LANCELOT ZAIRE DAWKINS, BLACK, MALE, 26 YEARS OLD, JUNE 6 1995, 6 FEET 2 INCHES, 150 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES IN CONNECTION WITH HER ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE, JEEP, WRANGLER WITH UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATES. BLACK TRIM AND BLACK STEPS. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN FORT WORTH, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE FORT WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS FORTH WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 1 7 3 9 2 4 2 2 2.
